Package org.activebpel.rt.util

Utility classes for XML handling, reading JARs, I/O, and a blocking queue.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeBlobInputStream Implemention of a known length stream.
AeBlockingQueue Implementation of a blocking queue.
AeCloser Convenience class for closing I/O without having to catch IOException.
AeCombinations Returns an iterator with the possible non-repeating subset combinations of an array of objects.
AeCompareXML Compare two xml elements for match (use setting of MatchOrder to force order checking).
AeConsoleLogHandler Logging handler that will write messages to the system console.
AeDate Utility class for date parsing.
AeDeferredMapFactory A base class for building a Map whose contents won't be loaded until the map is accessed.
AeFileUtil Common file utility methods.
AeFilteredIterator Allows base class for filtering contents of an iterator
AeHTMLFormatter Utility class for massaging strings to appear in HTML
AeIntMap Wraps a Map with convenience methods to simplify using int values for map keys.
AeIntSet Wraps a Set with convenience methods to simplify using int values for members.
AeJarReaderUtil Utilty class for reading jar files.
AeJCEUtil Static utility methods supporting JCE encryption, decryption
AeLoggerFactory Factory class for creating a logger
AeLongMap Wraps a Map with convenience methods to simplify using long values for map keys.
AeLongSet Wraps a Set with convenience methods to simplify using long values for members.
AeLRUObjectCache Generic object caching.
AeMessageFormatter This abstract base forms the foundation of indexed, formatted output, which facilitates management of the format strings as localizable resources.
AeMimeUtil Utility methods for working with mime attributes
AeMutex Implements mutual exclusion monitor that supports reentrant locking.
AeMutex.AeMutexStackTrace Wraps a message and stack trace together.
AER Constants and utility methods for the application runtime.
AeSafelyViewableCollection Implements a Collection wrapper that maintains a safely readable view of an underlying base collection.
AeSafelyViewableMap Implements a Map wrapper that maintains a safely readable view of an underlying base map.
AeSafelyViewableSet Implements a Collection wrapper that maintains a safely readable view of an underlying base collection.
AeSequenceIterator Represents the logical concatenation of multiple java.util.Iterator objects as well as individually added objects.
AeSequenceReader Joins two readers together much like java.io.SequenceInputStream
AeSOAPElementUtil Utility methods for converting SOAPElements to DOM elements and vice-versa
AeStaticConstantsMap Implements a map between the names and values of the static fields in a Java class or interface.
AeTypedSet Base class for typed sets.
AeUnsynchronizedCharArrayWriter Extends CharArrayWriter with unsynchronized write methods.
AeUTF8Util Utility class for supporting UTF-8 encoding.
AeUtil Utility methods
AeXmlUtil Utility methods for working with XML.
AeXPathUtil Convenience methods for using xpath.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.util Description

Utility classes for XML handling, reading JARs, I/O, and a blocking queue.
